TestDescription.name: W3 total cache debug mode
TestDescription.Description: W3 Total Cache is a WordPress caching plugin. This plugin has a debug mode where detailed information about each cache will be appended in HTML comments in the page's source code. The debug mode is enabled on this website.
TestDescription.Impact: W3 Total Cache debug mode may disclose sensitive information. This information can be used to launch further attacks.
TestDescription.Recommendation: It's recommended to disable debug mode on production websites.
